PvLogSink Class Referenceabstract

Class used to register logging callbacks from your application. More...

Public Member Functions

 PvLogSink ()
 Log sink constructor: registers the log sink.
 
virtual ~PvLogSink ()
 Log sink destructor: unregisters the log sink.
 

Detailed Description

Class used to register logging callbacks from your application.

Inherit your class from this class and override the virtual pure Log method in order to get callbacks on all eBUS SDK logging events.

The documentation for this class was generated from the following files:
